documents.document: @MarianKeyes Makes me miss my sister...

@caitrionambalfe Yes, seeing this after the anniversary of Dunblane yesterday, it's so sad and hard to sink in...

Sheldon: Did Albert Einstein ever sit in any of these chairs? Lady: I think these are fairly new. But Stephen Hawking's eaten here a lot. Sheldon: Yeah, but he brings his own chair, you know?
-BBT S11E17
#RIPStephenHawking

@MarianKeyes @TonyBainz Sob! Did Himself use the camera and tripod to smash the figurines to smithereens? Sending hugs from BallycullenLand xxxx
@MarianKeyes Gorgeous dress on a gorgeouser woman xx
@MarianKeyes That's what happens when you sleep past your bedtime... Oh, to be 20 again. Or maybe not.

@MarianKeyes Holy moly! I was in bed before you, Marian!! You party animal, you! xxx
@Schofe When I saw James Corden join in, I thought, well they can't surely have @Schofe on too, can they? And then there you were!!! How glorious! That's made my night!
Just a reminder @SamHeughan for @caitrionambalfe 's pint. You're welcome.🇮🇪☘️🏉 https://t.co/nWya7W5Gd1
@HamillHimself We really miss her. She was there in spirit, sitting down in that yoga pose alongside her space brother, wondering how the frak to get up!! #WeMissOurPrincess
@caitrionambalfe @SixNationsRugby @IrishRugby A good day for crêpes and Taytos. Don't ask lol!
@SamHeughan If it's any consolation, England can't beat France either (and Scotland was amazing against England!) @caitrionambalfe 🏴󠁧󠁢󠁥󠁮󠁧󠁿🏴󠁧󠁢󠁳󠁣󠁴󠁿🇮🇪☘️🏉🇮🇪🏉☘️ #SixNationsChampions
@MarianKeyes Football first. I only watch rugby when Scotland played. Then I married Vinny. So I watch Ireland. My first love is always #LFC (see you soon, @TonyBainz ahem!).
@caitrionambalfe @IrishRugby @SamHeughan @GuinnessIreland @SixNationsRugby Woo hoooo!!! Now let's hope France beat England and make this weekend even better, Caitriona!!!!
@caitrionambalfe @SamHeughan 💚☘🇮🇪💚☘🇮🇪💚🇮🇪💚☘🇮🇪💚☘🇮🇪💶💷💶💷💶💷
@SamHeughan At least the Flower of Scotland is playing... Someone brought his bagpipes 😘
@SamHeughan Awww it's ok. We still love you and Scotland!! It was always going to be tough playing Ireland at the Aviva 💚🇮🇪☘🏉 #COYBIG
@SamHeughan Methinks you're in trouble. How about 2 pints per 10 points @caitrionambalfe ?! ☘🇮🇪💚🏉
@SamHeughan Ireeeelaaaaand!!! 💚☘🇮🇪🏉
@SamHeughan 14-3 💚🇮🇪☘🏉💚🇮🇪☘#COYBIG (I still love you Scotland 💙)
@SamHeughan A proper pint of Guinness, Sam!! Not the stuff in a can! First half... Try! #COYBIG
@caitrionambalfe Hope that's a proper pint, Caitriona! Not the stuff you get outside of Ireland... #ShoulderToShoulder #COYBIG

@SamHeughan I've decided to cheer on both, Sam, as my heart is with both Ireland and Scotland! 1st half with Scotland. 2nd half with Ireland. @caitrionambalfe 🇮🇪🏴󠁧󠁢󠁳󠁣󠁴󠁿☘️🏉 #MarriedToIrishman #IREvsSCO #SixNations #COYBIG #EliteVsTunnocks #ILoveTunnocks #FeckingConfused https://t.co/HWASpkZCp0

RT @HamillHimself: I need to acknowledge the countless writers, directors, actors, people-behind-the scenes & fans for making my life "a no…

@HamillHimself No. Thank YOU, Mark. For making this 11 year old dream big in 1977. Cry in 1980. And go mad in 1983 (it was junior year in HS; hated algebra II!). But thru these past 41 yrs, you, Star Wars and Luke have been constant in my life. MTFBWY Always

@MarianKeyes Febreeze. That's all. On cushions, curtains, carpets, tables, on yerself... !!

@Gorgxous_ 4 years. How quickly time goes by. And yet how everything is still stuck in time, as even though lives are moving on, even for you, Maira and all the MH370 families. Stay strong, but don't be afraid to always cry for your daddy. Hugs from Dublin always xx https://t.co/im0MKrnH23
